id.description: The user's id. ('me' can be used if you are using a user level API key)

is_recording.description: Whether or not recording should be enabled.

play_message.description: Whether or not to play a message to indicate the call is being recorded (or recording has stopped).

recording_type.description:
Whether or not to toggle recording for the operator call (personal recording),
the group call (department recording), or both.

Only applicable for group calls (call centers, departments, etc.)
